title: The Rise of Tiger
brightcove_name: 100 Greatest Moments In Sports - No. 7 - The Rise of Tiger
brightcove_short_desc: At 21, Tiger Woods took the golf world by storm in his first major championship as a professional. He won the Masters with an 18-under 270, beating the runner-up by 12 strokes.
brightcove_long_desc: At 21, Tiger Woods took the golf world by storm in his first major championship as a professional. He won the Masters with an 18-under 270, beating the runner-up by 12 strokes.
headline: The Rise of Tiger
page_title: Tiger Woods wins 1997 Masters, his first major golf tournament
body: Twenty-one year-old Tiger Woods took the golf world by storm in his first major championship as a professional. He won the Masters with an 18-under 270, beating the runner-up by 12 strokes.
